name: Pong-Snake
description:
This game combines the two popular Arcade games Pong and Snake.

You play against another person or an AI (would not recommend, is still pretty bad) Game starts as Pong and changes randomly into Snake, where you try collect fruits before the other player (or AI) does. You can collect an Item that changes back to Pong. Pong gives a score of 2 and Snake a score of 1.

Controls:

W, A, S, D for Player 1

Up, Left, Down, Right for Player 2

Esc to pause (or to go back in Start menu options)
